author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, to address https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48603.

Update includes: 
 - `Run3ScoutingEBRecHit` (version 3)
 - `Run3ScoutingEERecHit` (version 3)
 - `Run3ScoutingHBHERecHit` (version 3)

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests` runs fine.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A, see also https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48603#issuecomment-3108754280
title: Update `TestRun3ScoutingFormats.sh` for `CMSSW_15_1_0_pre5` updates
